reference.title: Limitations of XML schema editor
reference.shortdesc: This section describes known product aspect limitations and workarounds.

section.title: Hebrew Logical encoding
section.p: When Hebrew Logical (ISO-8859-8-I) encoding is selected as a preference for encoding of HTML files (WindowPreferences Web and XML FilesHTML files in the "When creating files" section), the HTML documentation files generated from an XML schema file will still have a UTF-8 encoding. This is a known problem.
